The extension manager checks requirements and you can enable the DRS - the Development Reporting System. The DRS reports the work flow.

Warning: The DRS - Development Reporting System - is enabled. This costs performance and is a security risk for any operative sytem. You can disable the DRS in the extension manager. Status: %status%.
Bug: This plugin isn't saved never.
... fix it. Include the Static Template "Flip it!: Basis (obligate!)"!
Congratulations: Your configuration is proper!
The Constant Editor offers a lot of further properties. Look for the category: [FLIP IT! ...]
Flip it! handles PDF files only.
